page.title: 04BUS SERVICES
page.content: There is a bus service operated by {Sureline}.This bus company is based in {Lurgan}.The buses are brown and orange.There are three buses each morning to bring workers to the town and children to school.Our school bus arrives at 08.45 and then takes secondary school pupils to{Lurgan.}At 13.30 a bus collects the young children from school and returns to the town at 14.00.In the afternoon there are three buses for school children.The last bus comes from{Lurgan}at 17.30.Saturdays have fewer buses.On Sunday there is only one bus. Most families need a car.Half of Ardmore pupils travel to school by car.There are 15 families in school and 9 of these have 2 or more cars.
